about.title: Welcome to Tobe Shop
about.subtitle: Your trusted marketplace for quality products and exceptional service

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create a seamless and secure online marketplace that connects buyers with trusted sellers, offering quality products and exceptional customer service.

features.title: What We Offer
features.marketplaceDesc: Connect with sellers worldwide and discover unique products
features.securityDesc: Advanced security measures to protect your transactions
features.deliveryDesc: Efficient shipping and delivery tracking system
features.supportDesc: Dedicated customer service team ready to help

values.title: Our Values
values.innovationDesc: Continuously improving our platform to provide the best shopping experience
values.integrityDesc: Building trust through transparent and honest business practices
values.communityDesc: Creating a vibrant marketplace community that benefits both buyers and sellers

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.messageSent: Your message has been sent successfully!

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to TobeShop. By accessing and using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

userAgreement.title: User Agreement
userAgreement.content: By using our services, you agree to comply with these terms and all applicable laws and regulations.

accountResponsibilities.title: Account Responsibilities
accountResponsibilities.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and for all activities under your account.

purchases.title: Purchases
purchases.content: All purchases made through our platform are subject to our order processing and shipping policies.

sellerGuidelines.title: Seller Guidelines
sellerGuidelines.content: Sellers must comply with our marketplace guidelines, including accurate product descriptions and fair pricing.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content on TobeShop, including logos, text, and images, is protected by intellectual property rights.

limitations.title: Limitations of Liability
limitations.content: TobeShop is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of our services.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend accounts that violate our terms or for any other reason.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us.

introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how TobeShop ('we', 'us', or 'our') collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website and services. We are committed to ensuring that your privacy is protected and maintaining the trust you place in us.

scope.title: Scope of This Policy
scope.content: This policy applies to all information collected through our website (tobeshop.com), mobile applications, and any related services, sales, marketing, or events. By using our platform, you consent to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services to you:

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.content: Name, email address, postal address, phone number, date of birth, payment information, and government-issued identification when required for verification.

payment.title: Transaction Information
payment.content: Payment card details, bank account information, purchase history, billing and shipping addresses, and other details related to your transactions.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.content: IP address, browser type, device information, operating system, time zone, pages viewed, links clicked, and other usage patterns.

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We use the collected information for various purposes, always in compliance with applicable data protection laws.

purposes.title: Specific Purposes
purposes.content:
• Process your transactions and maintain your account
• Provide customer support and respond to inquiries
• Send important notices and updates
• Detect and prevent fraud
• Improve our services and user experience
• Comply with legal obligations
• Send marketing communications (with your consent)

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We share your information only in the following circumstances:

thirdParties.title: Service Providers
thirdParties.content: We share information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our platform, conducting business, and serving users, subject to strict confidentiality agreements.

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.content: We may disclose information when required by law, to protect our rights, or to comply with a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information, including encryption, firewalls, and secure socket layer technology (SSL). However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze usage patterns.

types.title: Types of Cookies We Use
types.content:
• Essential cookies for website functionality
• Analytics cookies to understand user behavior
• Advertising cookies for targeted marketing
• Preference cookies to remember your settings

userRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
userRights.content: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:

access.title: Access and Control
access.content: You can request access to your personal information, correct inaccurate data, and update your preferences at any time through your account settings.

deletion.title: Right to Deletion
deletion.content: You can request deletion of your personal information, subject to certain exceptions provided by law, such as information we are legally required to retain.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When we no longer need the information, we will securely delete or anonymize it.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information and comply with applicable data protection laws.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect or maintain personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete such information.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests related to this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact our Privacy Team at:
